mapper.select: SELECT a.club_code, a.club_name, a.club_cost, a.club_loc, a.club_intro, a.club_signtype, a.club_memtot, a.club_pic, a.club_rpic,a.ctmid_code, (SELECT count(m.mc_joinstate) FROM MEMCLUB m WHERE a.club_code = m.club_code AND m.mc_joinstate ='Y') AS club_left, nvl(aaa.cnt,0) AS mic_likes FROM CLUB a LEFT JOIN (SELECT CLUB_CODE, count(*) AS cnt FROM MEMINTERCLUB m2 WHERE mem_code = ${member.mem_code} GROUP BY CLUB_CODE) aaa ON a.CLUB_CODE = aaa.club_code ORDER BY CLUB_CODE DESC
SELECT club_name, club_intro, club_loc, club_rpic FROM club

SELECT a.club_code, a.club_name, a.club_cost, a.club_loc, a.club_intro, (SELECT count(m.mc_joinstate) FROM MEMCLUB m WHERE a.club_code = m.club_code AND m.mc_joinstate ='Y') AS club_left, a.club_signtype, a.club_memtot, a.club_pic, a.club_rpic,a.ctmid_code, nvl(aaa.cnt,0) AS mic_likes FROM CLUB a LEFT JOIN (SELECT CLUB_CODE, count(*) AS cnt FROM MEMINTERCLUB m2 WHERE mem_code = ${member.mem_code} GROUP BY CLUB_CODE) aaa ON a.CLUB_CODE = aaa.club_code WHERE a.CTMID_CODE = (SELECT c1.CTMID_CODE FROM CATEGORYMIDDLE c1 WHERE c1.CTMID_NAME = '${cate.ctmid_name}') ORDER BY CLUB_CODE DESC

SELECT a.club_code, a.club_name, a.club_cost, a.club_loc, a.club_intro, (SELECT count(m.mc_joinstate) FROM MEMCLUB m WHERE a.club_code = m.club_code AND m.mc_joinstate ='Y') AS club_left, a.club_signtype, a.club_memtot, a.club_pic, a.club_rpic,a.ctmid_code, nvl(aaa.cnt,0) AS mic_likes FROM CLUB a LEFT JOIN CATEGORYMIDDLE c2 ON a.CTMID_CODE = c2.CTMID_CODE LEFT JOIN CATEGORYHIGH c3 ON c2.CTHIGH_CODE = c3.CTHIGH_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT CLUB_CODE, count(*) AS cnt FROM MEMINTERCLUB m2 WHERE mem_code = ${member.mem_code} GROUP BY CLUB_CODE) aaa ON a.CLUB_CODE = aaa.club_code WHERE c3.CTHIGH_CODE = (select b.cthigh_code from categoryhigh b where b.cthigh_name='${cate.cthigh_name}') ORDER BY CLUB_CODE DESC

SELECT b.club_code, b.club_name, b.club_cost, b.club_loc, b.club_intro, b.club_signtype, b.club_memtot, b.club_pic, b.club_gender, b.club_maxage, a.ctmid_code, b.club_rpic, (SELECT count(m.mc_joinstate) FROM MEMCLUB m WHERE b.club_code = m.club_code AND m.mc_joinstate ='Y') AS club_left FROM CATEGORYMIDDLE a, CLUB b WHERE a.ctmid_code = b.ctmid_code AND b.club_code = #{club_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMCLUB (mc_code, club_code, mem_code, memct_code, mc_joinstate) VALUES(seq_memclub.nextval, ${club.club_code}, ${member.mem_code}, 1, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT CTMID_CODE FROM CATEGORYMIDDLE WHERE CTMID_NAME = #{ctmid_name}
